name: Centurum
overview: Centurum, Inc. provides network engineering, systems integration, systems engineering and design, information operations, and operational support services for net-centric military, intelligence, and civilian agencies. Its network engineering services include network design services, network installation services, systems integration, systems administration and operations, and technical support and helpdesk services. The company also provides systems integration services, such as requirements analysis, system design and engineering, integration into existing systems, installation and testing, training, and security services. In addition, it offers systems engineering and design services, such as installations and rework, equipment overhaul and refurbishment, safety engineering, configuration management, integrated logistics support, and customer support services. Further, the company provides information operations services, including information warfare, information assurance, information superiority, and intelligence analysis services. Furthermore, it offers operational support services, such as building and upgrading servers and workstations, technical support on software, telephone technical support, and training on computer hardware and software, as well as maintaining computers, printers, notebooks, and laptops. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in McLean, Virginia. It has additional offices in Washington, District Of Columbia; Charleston, South Carolina; Annapolis Junction, Maryland; Chesapeake, Virginia; San Diego, California; and Tampa, Florida.

milestones.description: Centurum Awarded a $77M Contract to Provide Command and Control Systems Support for the Department of Defense
milestones.source_description: Centurum Awarded a $77M Contract to Provide Command and Control Systems Support for the Department of Defense
